The best meal we had in Barcelona and possibly the freshest seafood we had ever eaten anywhere.  A busy back corner bar that displays there dishes on top of the counters of the bars and you order from the menu or by pointing to what you want.  Everything was delicious especially the mixed seafood grill.  We also tried the grilled vegetables and fried sardines.  The barman was helpful and friendly and the entire bar of patrons was having a great time enjoying the amazing food.  They even topped our beers off with more foam to enhance taste.We would definitely return to Barcelona and make Bar Clemens one of our first dining stops.
